constraints.name: path_constraint
constraints.description: 主干线上的车站之间存在一条路径，且路径长度为给定的距离
constraints.formal: ∀i ∈ [0, n-2], ∃ path(i, i+1) with length l_i

constraints.name: degree_upper_bound
constraints.description: 主干线上每个车站最多只能有一条支线

constraints.name: fixed_length_edge
constraints.description: 新添加的快速干线长度固定为 c 厘米
constraints.formal: ∃ edge(u, v) with length c, u ≠ v

constraints.name: diameter_minimization
constraints.description: 目标是使铁路网络的直径最小化
constraints.formal: minimize max_distance(u, v) for all pairs (u, v)
